Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1976...
Injured on 4/21/1977 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/14/1978, off Andrew Hastings (TRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/1978, off Cody Wilson (TRO)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Troy on 9/28/1979...
Drove in 9 runs against Troy on 4/9/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1981, hitting .435 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 4/3/1983 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/2/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $6,060,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (UBA) on 4/25/1984...
